title: Basic Computer Vision with ML (ML Zero to Hero - Part 2)
excerpt: In part two of Machine Learning Zero to Hero, AI Advocate Laurence Moroney (lmoroney@) walks through basic computer vision with machine learning by teaching a computer how to see and recognize different objects.
